hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Next you'll say:^"Why am I still reading these?"

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Small Key# and #the Light Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that racing #Damp√©'s ghost# rewards...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Nayru's Love#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Megaton Hammer# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Purple Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Hookshot#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #2# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #5# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Double Defense# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Right).text: Ganondorf doesn't specialize in hiding items, nor in keeping secrets for that matter.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Small Key# and #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Eyedrops#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.
